content: **crocheted table mat in drops muskat theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no r-773 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** approx 25 cm in diameter **materials** drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 80 sage green 50 g colour 08 off white 50 g colour 79 clove 50 g colour 09 nutmeg one mat weighs approx 30 g **crochet gauge** 20 treble crochets in width and 10 row in height = 10 x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
